tool_description: The perfect choice for developers looking to add QR code functionality to their applications.
name: QR Code by NewbAPI
title: QR Code by NewbAPI

api_list.name: Email
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-by-newbapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-by-newbapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
